project.name: C-C415A-WIRE-02-ST03-DT07-DF12-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C415A-WIRE-02-ST03-DT07-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C415A-WIRE-02-ST03-DT07-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="12345 Hello world!" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
